Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2011 01:06PM TheYesMom wrote: I am new to this list.  This is my first post.  Thank you Rock for your list.  Awesome.  I wanted to let you know about a book, "The Cancer Fighting Kitchen", full of yummy recipes, tonics and elixirs to help with the chemo side effects. Also, my nutritionist has me taking vitamin C.  I'm so confused.  To C or not to C?  One of the most difficult aspects of dealing with cancer are all of the different opinions out there about what one can have and not have especially when it comes to supplements.
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
